name: Ember Sword
storyline: Thanabus is a world of unknown origin, unlike anything found around the seven planets that orbit the Sun. Tidally locked and in an everlasting binary orbit with Ganymede, this strange moon of Jupiter bares a rich ecosystem, filled with vibrant locations and an exotic bestiary, foreign to our understanding. Devastated hundreds of years ago by an apocalyptic event, the world has since been quartered into four glorious regions, ripe for heroes to lay claim to. The path to adventure winds everywhere, from the lowest dungeon to the highest peak. Where will you make your mark?
summary:
Ember Sword, a modern rewrite of the games industry business model in favor of the user, and a love letter to MMORPG (Massively Online Role Playing Game) gamers.

Ember Sword has the fast-paced combat of aRPGs, combined with the isometric view and skill-based abilities of MOBAs, set in a persistent MMORPG fantasy universe.
